card.brandDescription: GatsbyJS Boilerplate helps you build fast, robust and adaptable apps or websites. Gatsby is a React-based open source framework with performance, scalability and security built-in. Collaborate, build and deploy 1000x faster with Gatsby. Start your project with the combined knowledge and effort of hundreds of thousands of dollars invested in development, all in one small package.

index.tutorialParagraph: A great place to start if you're new to web development. Designed to guide you through setting up your first website or application.
index.howToGuidesParagraph: Practical step-by-step guides to help you code your whole metaverse. Extremely useful to attract customers and friends.
index.referenceGuideParagraph: Detailed technical descriptions of how the GatsbyJS Theme works. That way you'll always have your help environment in your hands.
index.conceptualGuidesParagraph: General explanations of GatsbyJS Theme concepts. Here you can delve into specific topics.
index.pluginLibraryParagraph: Add functionality and customize your website or application with thousands of tools created by our amazing developer community.
index.buildHostParagraph: Now you're ready to change the world! Give your GatsbyJS Theme website superpowers. Get started for free!
